body:
Thanks, I didn't realise it was added. How about `roll`?

On Sat, 11 Aug 2018 at 14:55 Vishwak Srinivasan <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> flip is available from 0.4.1, and rot90 is in the works (@weiyangfb
> <https://github.com/weiyangfb>). I think fliplr and flipud are special
> cases of flip.
